svg:

Integration- Build- Run Tests - Unit Tests - Integration TestsDeliveryContainer ImageRegistryWrite OnlyProductionRead/OnlyPipelines are an expression of our confidence as a team that this application is "ready to go" to the next environment.Docker/Container Terms- Container Image: a package with your application, it's dependencies and all that jazz.. - you ship the application and the environment in a container. - this is how we: - get rid of "I don't know what is wrong, it runs on my machine!" category of errors. - We also don't DEPEND on the ops/infrastructure people to setup servers for us.- Container - what you get when you "docker run" a container image. It's the running thing, and it has and additional layer added temporarily that is read/write.- Build - taking a dockerfile and turning it into a container image.- Tag: A mark or label you apply to a container image. - Tags have the form of "registry/repository:version"27017
